text: Ni shuo:“Wo budui nimen shuo: Wo you an la de yiqie baozang. Wo ye budui nimen shuo: Wo neng zhi youxuan. Wo ye budui nimen shuo: Wo shi yige tianshi. Wo zhishi zuncong wo suo shou de qishi.” Ni shuo:“Wu yan de ren he you yan de ren shi bushi xiangdeng de? Nandao nimen bu gai xiang xiang ma?”
